sn4.21:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati silavatiyam.
sn4.21:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu bhagavato avidure appamatta atapino pahitatta viharanti.
sn4.21:1.4: Atha kho maro papima brahmanavannam abhinimminitva mahantena jatanduvena ajinakkhipanivattho jinno gopanasivanko ghurughurupassasi udumbaradandam gahetva yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn4.21:1.5: “dahara bhavanto pabbajita susu kalakesa bhadrena yobbanena samannagata pathamena vayasa anikkilitavino kamesu.
sn4.21:1.8: “Na kho mayam, brahmana, sanditthikam hitva kalikam anudhavama.
sn4.21:1.9: Kalikanca kho mayam, brahmana, hitva sanditthikam anudhavama.
sn4.21:1.10: Kalika hi, brahmana, kama vutta bhagavata bahudukkha bahupayasa, adinavo ettha bhiyyo.
sn4.21:1.11: Sanditthiko ayam dhammo akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti.
sn4.21:1.12: Evam vutte, maro papima sisam okampetva jivham nillaletva tivisakham nalate nalatikam vutthapetva dandamolubbha pakkami.
sn4.21:2.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn4.21:2.2: “idha mayam, bhante, bhagavato avidure appamatta atapino pahitatta viharama.
sn4.21:2.3: Atha kho, bhante, annataro brahmano mahantena jatanduvena ajinakkhipanivattho jinno gopanasivanko ghurughurupassasi udumbaradandam gahetva yena mayam tenupasankami; upasankamitva amhe etadavoca:
sn4.21:2.4: ‘dahara bhavanto pabbajita susu kalakesa bhadrena yobbanena samannagata pathamena vayasa anikkilitavino kamesu.
sn4.21:2.7: Evam vutte, mayam, bhante, tam brahmanam etadavocumha:
sn4.21:2.8: ‘na kho mayam, brahmana, sanditthikam hitva kalikam anudhavama.
sn4.21:2.9: Kalikanca kho mayam, brahmana, hitva sanditthikam anudhavama.
sn4.21:2.10: Kalika hi, brahmana, kama vutta bhagavata bahudukkha bahupayasa, adinavo ettha bhiyyo.
sn4.21:2.11: Sanditthiko ayam dhammo akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
sn4.21:2.12: Evam vutte, bhante, so brahmano sisam okampetva jivham nillaletva tivisakham nalate nalatikam vutthapetva dandamolubbha pakkanto”ti.
sn4.21:3.2: Maro eso papima tumhakam vicakkhukammaya agato”ti.
sn4.21:3.3: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
